description.value: Your eyes are sharp, allowing you to make out small details about concealed or even invisible creatures that others might miss. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] action to find @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] creatures within 30 feet of you. When you target an opponent that is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] from you or hidden from you, reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or 9 for a hidden one.
